text: Jean Porter in G.I. Jane G.I. Jane is a 1951 American film musical directed by Reginald Le Borg.Jean Porter, actress - obituary Telegraph.co.uk; London [London]06 Apr 2018. G.I. JANE Monthly Film Bulletin; London Vol. 21, Iss. 240, (Jan 1, 1954): 9. The Los Angeles Times said it "offers some pleasing numbers".'Little Egypt' Shows How Cooch Dance Won at Fair Schallert, Edwin. Los Angeles Times 13 Sep 1951: A10. ==Cast== *Jean Porter as Jan Smith *Tom Neal as Tim Rawlings *Iris Adrian as Lt. Adrian *Jimmie Dodd as Pvt. Tennessee Jones *Jeanne Mahoney as Hilda Beck *Jimmy Lloyd as Lt. Bradford *Mara Lynn as Pilsnick *Michael Whalen as Major ==References== ==External links== * *G.I. title: G.I. Jane (1951 film)
